story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I love the atmosphere right before a
festival starts!
story_alola_01_03000/2401_0401_0400_10:
It’s an Alola-style event hosted by the
Aether Foundation.
story_alola_01_03000/2401_0402_0600_10:
The Aether Foundation is putting on an
Alola-style festival!
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
It’s not just about teaching folks about Alola’s
culture—they also want to spread the word
about Pokémon conservation.
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_0900_10: You look ready to go in that outfit, Hau!
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
The design is based on one of Alola’s
guardian deities!
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_1100_10: Oh, like the one Mina’s wearing?
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_1200_10: Yup! They’re perfect for an Alola-style festival!
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: Yo! That’s a sweet outfit you’ve got on!
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
It’s just no fair. Why’s it always you? We want in
on this party, too!
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: Lend me those clothes! Hand ’em over, yo!
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
If you wanna enjoy the festival, you shouldn’t
cause trouble!
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Are we gonna have to teach ’em a lesson with a
Pokémon battle?
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_2300_10:
This festival’s run by the foundation, and our
promise still stands.
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_2700_10: Did Plumeria just help us out?
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_2900_10: Heh. Guess you didn’t need our help after all.
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_3200_10: Did you come for the festival too?
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_3300_10: We did, but we’ve run into a bit of a problem...
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_3400_10:
We know how strong you are, so we’d like to ask
you for a favor.
story_alola_01_03000/2401_1001_3500_10: Help us protect the Ultra Beasts.
